name: Red Herring RPG
description:
A game made for interact-if's nonranked 2022 January game jam, following the prompt of 'red herring'. Play as a young anthro frog and save the river.

Aiming to update the eventually with better writing, more exploration, and a few other things.  I know some of the text display is weird in some passages --ie odd whitespace -- and I am working to try and fix that as well as any remaining bugs.
